channel.title: Spare Key :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: Objective Difficulty Description 1/5 Help Goose Barry near the pond identify which identity has been granted excessive Owner permissions at the subscription level, violating the principle of least privilege. Goose Barry mission statement You want me to say what exactly? Do I really look like someone who says MOOO? The Neighborhood HOA hosts a static website on Azure Storage. An admin accidentally uploaded an infrastructure config file that contains a long-lived SAS token.
